data.name: Servicio Al Toque
data.description:
A web application built with Laravel (for both the frontend and backend).
In the case of the frontend, it was build using Laravel Blade with a Bootstrap 4 based layout.

This web application includes: Geolocation, Login System, Payments Options (PayPal & Stripe), and its fully responsive.

data.name: Marroquinería Stallion

The web application for the E-Commerce of Stallion Marroquinería.

This app was built using Next JS, TypeScript, and MaterialUI for the frontend, and Laravel as backend API, with MySQL database.
